content:
Based on the provided logs, here is the report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting System (around position 45,-81)
Consists of following entities:
- Input chest with iron ore at (45.5, -79.5)
- Two stone furnaces at (45.0, -81.0) and (47.0, -81.0)
- Two burner inserters at (46.5, -79.5) and (48.5, -79.5) facing LEFT
- Output chest with iron plates at (49.5, -80.5)

### Coal Mining System (around position 41,-82)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0) mining coal
- Three storage chests:
  - Iron chest at (41.5, -84.5) storing coal
  - Iron chest at (41.5, -83.5) storing coal  
  - Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) storing coal
- Additional wooden chest at (45.5, -84.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Collisions
- Before placing entities, check if the target position is already occupied
- When placing inserters, ensure there is sufficient clear space around the target position
- Consider using different coordinates if initial placement fails due to collision

### Resource Management
- Monitor chest capacity - several chests are showing "chest is full" warnings
- Implement chest emptying logic when they reach capacity to prevent mining stoppage
- Ensure mining drills have constant fuel supply to prevent "out of fuel" conditions

### System Design
- Consider implementing better coal distribution system as furnaces show fuel warnings
- Add logic to handle "no ingredients to smelt" condition in furnaces

NAMESPACE

Functions:
- place_entity(): Places entities on the map
  Success: When target location is clear
  Failure: When location is occupied or terrain is unplaceable

Important Variables:
- first_inserter: Entity (burner-inserter)
- second_inserter: Entity (burner-inserter)
